lines.text: You crawling black scum! You sneaking she-wolf! You dirty squaw! I'll kill you when I get loose!
You won't notice it much. The mounted police wear red coats.
Down where I come from we don't jump to conclusions. It's liable to be a feller's last jump.
I was pinned under a log so tight I was breathin' on the installment plan.
Listen you little wildcat, you're the only real thing that's ever happened to me. And nobody, nothing could ever make me let you go.
I love you so terrible bad I feel good.
You know, I-I kinda gotta feelin' that I could make things easier for ya if you'd let me.
You're a grand person, Dusty, but there ain't anything anyone can do for me.
Sure there is. Come to Texas with me. You're the loveliest and gentlest lady I've ever known.

[Lovesick mountie Ronnie Logan falls hard for femme fatale Louvette Corbeau, who is secretly in league with the revolutionaries]
You're the sweetest poison that ever got into a man's blood. I love you. I *want* you! Listen, you little wildcat, you're the only real thing that's ever happened to me. A nobody... nothing... could ever make me let go of you!
Oh, I love you so terrible bad I feel good! My heart sings like a bird!
Oh, Dusty! You're an angel in leather!
(laughs) I'd look funny in leather wings.
It will be when you get there.
